ygData.msgSnippet: Koga Shuko/The Oblitercons/Nemesis Enforcer/Double ... Work at the autoguns.  Get our defenses pounding on the attacking forces, quickly! ... claws dug into

Koga Shuko/The Oblitercons/Nemesis Enforcer/Double 
Punch/Injector/Manterror/Unitron:

::Koga Shuko looked to Sicent::
"Work at the autoguns.  Get our defenses pounding on the attacking forces, 
quickly!"

::Unitron aimed his rifles at the back of Zardus' head, but two sets of 3 
claws dug into his shoulders, lifting him into the air 20 feet, then dropping 
him, Unitron unconsciouss, or so it seemed::

::Pyro landed next to Zardus::
"We have arrived.  Dark One and the others will be attacking the ship."
"Pyro, obliterize!" ::Pyro transformed to his robot mode, noticing the flames 
around him::
"Oh...fire...I like fire...HEHE!" ::Pyro fired off a long burst of flames at 
the downed ship::

-------------

::Double Punch looked to Injector, then to Manterror::
"I will go in my stealth mode, and take out that Oblitercon person.  You two 
will do what you can, kill or capture Zardus.  I'm sure he'd be cause for a 
hefty ransom.  Watch out for Nemesis and that guy.  I can't see his face, but 
he looks familiar::

------------

::Pyro halted his flames for a moment::
"Hmmm...the flames are s-AIIIIEEEE!" Pyro screamed as two missiles exploded 
agianst his back, sending him slamming 25 feet away on his chest::

::Injector ran up behind Zardus, firing off a stinger missile at the middle 
of his back::

"Die!" ::Manterror fired an ion disk at the front of Zardus' left leg::

::Nemesis slowly got up, leaping into the air and tackling Injector to the 
ground, slamming his elbow into the Predacon's side, a missile that became 
visible suddenly hit Nemesis at an angle so that it didn't hurt Injector, but 
it hurt him, Nemesis passing out again on his side::

::Pyro slowly got up, two more missiles sending him crashing to the ground, 
unconsciouss::

::Unitron got up, charging, leaping into the air, right leg outstretched, 
doing an old fashioned jump kick on Manterror, the Predacon slamming 
backwards, a missile to the chest sending Unitron to his back, unconsciouss 
this time::
